    public abstract class PlayerItem
extends Describable
    Abstract class to represent items the player can place and remove from their inventory

      • canTake

        protected boolean canTake()
        Returns:
        true if the Player is allowed to take this item

      • take

        protected void take()
        Removes the item from its current MapLocation and places it in the Player.inventory

      • canDrop

        protected boolean canDrop()
        Returns:
        true if the Player can drop this item instance

      • drop

        protected void drop()
        Removes the item from the Player.inventory and places at the Player.currentLocation
